title: Wrangler Men's 20X Slim Fit Straight Leg Jeans
description: SLIM FIT. These jeans have a slim fit through the seat and thigh with a straight leg opening that fits over your favorite pair of boots. This jean sits lower on the waist for a comfortable fit.
MODERN WESTERN STYLE. Take pride in heritage style with these men's 20X jeans. Made for daytime tasks or out at the bars, these slim fit jeans have a contemporary western look.
BUILT TO LAST. Made with durable materials, these jeans will allow you to move with comfort. With a slight stretch, these jeans give you enough flexibility to comfortably move throughout your day.
SIGNATURE FINISHES. Finished with a zipper fly, button closure and embroidered back pockets.
FIVE-POCKET STYLE. This 5-pocket slim cut jean is made with (2) front pockets, (2) back pockets and (1) coin pocket.
